name.ja: エクスキューティー・ブレイク！

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, place 1 face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF from your field on either the top or bottom of the owner's Deck.

effect.en: Negate the attack. Then, if you have a face-up Level 6 monster with 500 DEF on your field, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.
